unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi is crucial. We need a robust strategy for the 2024 batch. Focus on CS and ECE. Target internship offers before 31/12/2023. Package: Rs. 20 Lakhs+, benefits included. Consider regional colleges like NIT Trichy too. Interviews scheduled 10/01/2024 and 12/01/2024 from 11:00 hrs onwards. Prepare a strong presentation highlighting our projects in Bangalore. Jai Hind!
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi is crucial. We need a robust strategy for the two thousand and twenty four batch. Focus on C S and E C E. Target internship offers before thirty first december two thousand and twenty three. Package: rupees twenty lakhs plus, benefits included. Consider regional colleges like N I T Trichy too. Interviews scheduled tenth january two thousand and twenty four and twelfth january two thousand and twenty four from eleven hours onwards. Prepare a strong presentation highlighting our projects in Bangalore. Jai Hind!
